summary:
**Capital Raising Announcement:**  
- **Structure:** Placement only  
- **Total Capital Raised:** A$780,000 (39m shares @ A$0.02 per share)  
- **Key Terms:** 
  - 16.7% discount to last traded price (2 July 2025), 17.2% premium to 15-day VWAP  
  - Attached options: 1 free option per 3 shares, exercisable at A$0.03 by 13 June 2030  
- **Settlement Date:** 4 July 2025  
- **Use of Proceeds:** Iberian Copper Project exploration & working capital  
- **Additional Issuance:** 3m consultant options (same terms as Placement Options)  

*Omitted non-material details (institutional investor names, project descriptions, director/contact info).*
